title: Spotted: Hunt prototype carbon-spoke, 1151g disc brake road wheels at Tour de France
content:
The Tour de France mountains have given us a sneak peek at another set of prototype wheels being tested, this time an ultralight set of low-profile Hunt Carbon Spoke, disc brake tubulars. Spotted under Colombian rider Sergio Henao of Qhubeka NextHash, the wheels combine similar lightweight, race-ready tech we’ve seen from the UK wheel company […]

The post Spotted: Hunt prototype carbon-spoke, 1151g disc brake road wheels at Tour de France appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
